about_the_game: Add a new creature to your team with the V-Egg Guaxinito! This DLC allows you to adopt a Guaxinito, an adorable and unique species of monster that brings special abilities to your team. Unlock new strategic possibilities and make your journey even more exciting with this loyal companion. Guaxinito is the perfect ally for those seeking a charismatic and powerful monster in their adventures within the V-Monsters universe!
detailed_description: Add a new creature to your team with the V-Egg Guaxinito! This DLC allows you to adopt a Guaxinito, an adorable and unique species of monster that brings special abilities to your team. Unlock new strategic possibilities and make your journey even more exciting with this loyal companion. Guaxinito is the perfect ally for those seeking a charismatic and powerful monster in their adventures within the V-Monsters universe!
